GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object by its id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object by its username

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts an object as a comment and adds it to comments for given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count on an article

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by given comment_id
